mapper.select: select * from js_team_info t LEFT JOIN js_team_member m on t.id = m.team_id where m.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT t.team_name name, u1.name best, r.count count, r.total TotalRank FROM js_team_info t LEFT JOIN js_user u1 ON t.id = u1.team_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT team_id,sum(rank) total, count(id) count from js_user group by team_id) r on t.id = r.team_id WHERE u1.rank = (SELECT max( rank ) rank FROM js_user u WHERE u.team_id = t.id ) ORDER BY r.total DESC
